Lawn Mowing Simulator is a singleplayer game.

Availability[edit]

Source DRM Notes Keys OS
GamersGate
Green Man Gaming
Humble Store
Microsoft Store
Included with Xbox Game Pass for PC. Purchase includes an Xbox X/S version.
Steam
All versions require Steam DRM.

System Location
Windows
Steam Play (Linux) <Steam-folder>/steamapps/compatdata/1480560/pfx/[Note 1]

Save game data location[edit]

System Location
Windows %USERPROFILE%\AppData\LocalLow\Curve Digital\Lawn Mowing Simulator
Steam Play (Linux) <Steam-folder>/steamapps/compatdata/1480560/pfx/[Note 1]

System requirements[edit]

Windows
Minimum Recommended
Operating system (OS) 10
Processor (CPU) Intel Core i7-7700HQ 2.8 GHz
AMD FX-9590 4.7 GHz		 Intel Core i7-6950X 3.0 GHz
AMD Ryzen 7 1700X 3.4 GHz
System memory (RAM) 8 GB
Hard disk drive (HDD) 20 GB
Video card (GPU) Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
AMD Radeon R9 390X
4 GB (Nvidia), 8 GB (AMD) of VRAM
DirectX 11 compatible 		Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060 Super
AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
6 GB (Nvidia), 8 GB (AMD) of VRAM
DirectX 12 compatible

Notes

  1. ↑ 1.0 1.1 File/folder structure within this directory reflects the path(s) listed for Windows and/or Steam game data (use Wine regedit to access Windows registry paths). Games with Steam Cloud support may store data in ~/.steam/steam/userdata/<user-id>/1480560/ in addition to or instead of this directory. The app ID (1480560) may differ in some cases. Treat backslashes as forward slashes. See the glossary page for details.
